H0.text: Beaker is the part of the system that experiences an increase in heat energy when a student transfers a beaker containing a hot solution from the lab table to a cool water bath.

H1.text: The lab table is the part of the system that experiences an increase in heat energy when a student transfers a beaker containing a hot solution from the lab table to a cool water bath.

H2.text: The solution experiences an increase in heat energy when a student in a laboratory transfers a beaker containing a hot solution from the lab table to a cool water bath.

H3.text: The water bath experiences an increase in heat energy when a student transfers a beaker containing a hot solution from the lab table to it.

A4.text: The hot reservoir always and only supplies energy, and the cold reservoir always and only receives energy.
